name: NesusRPG
description: Hi, thanks for stumbling upon this game! If you like the style of Shakes & Fidget or Hero zero, you are in the right place! I am implementing this game for that kind of people, I have many of those ideas I hope you will like it, for now it is in ITALIAN but I will put the MULTI-LANGUAGE function let me know! If you want to support my game with 0.10 Euros or even more if you want.
